'''Patate''' is a town in [[Ecuador]] in the [[Tungurahua Province|Tungurahua]] Province in northwestern South America between [[San Juan de Ambato]] and [[Baños Canton|Baños]]. It is close to the foothills of the still active [[Tungurahua| Tungurahua volcano]].
[[File:Tungurahua desde patate.JPG|thumb|left|180px|Tungurahua volcano as seen from Patate]]
